name: textgrad
text:

Title: "{title}"
Description: "{body}"

Classify this issue as exactl... The model predicted 'Understood, you will provide the title and description of a GitHub issue and I will classify it based on the provided options. Please provide the issue report.' but the correct answer should be 'question'. Provide feedback on how to improve the system prompt to correctly classify this as 'question'.

Based on the title and description, classify issues into one of the predefined categories.
Be concise and answer with only the classification label.

Response: To improve the system prompt for correctly classifying the issue as 'question,' you can adjust it to ensure that the model focuses on identifying whether the issue posed is seeking information or clarity. Here's an improved prompt suggestion:

"You are a software engineering assistant specializing in categorizing GitHub issues. Based on the provided title and description of an issue, classify the issue into one of the predefined categories: 'bug,' 'feature request,' 'question,' 'documentation,' or other relevant categories. If the issue is seeking information, clarification, or guidance, classify it as 'question.' Provide only the classification label."
